attributes.action: Urge India to stop killings in Kashmir& FreeKashmir form cruel administration.
attributes.additional_details:
Life is stuck, everyday petroling, shelling& beating ppl
The dispute of Kashmir started after the departure of British rule from the region and leaving the state of Kashmir to decide its fate. The Maharaja of Kashmir decided to merge with India against people's wishes. People's demand is a plebiscite to decide their own fate, which India has been denying. There is over 200,000 thousand Indian armed forces besides police and other security personnel to keep a tight control on the region by might.
attributes.background: More than 68,000 people have been killed in the uprising and the subsequent Indian military crackdown in Indian occupied Kashmir. In the current wave of unrest since 08/07/16 more then 80 protestors have been killed (including children) and more than thouands are injured by Indian forces.
